title: Verify a new user can be set up
custom_preconds: GIVEN The Admin is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The Admin clicks Users in the left menu
AND The Admin clicks the "Setup User" button
AND The Admin inputs the LDAP2 user name
AND The Admin clicks the "Setup" button
AND The Admin sets up the new user's Network/Property access
AND The Admin clicks the Save & Continue button
AND The Admin sets up the new user's permissions
AND The Admin clicks the Save & Continue button
AND The Admin sets up the new user's profile
AND The Admin clicks the Save & Continue button
custom_expected: THEN The new user shows up in the Users list

title: Verify a user's profile can be modified from the Users page
custom_preconds: GIVEN The Admin is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The Admin clicks "Users" in the left menu
AND The Admin searches for a user's username
AND The Admin clicks on the user's name
AND The Admin clicks Profile
AND The Admin changes one of the inputs in the fields
AND The Admin clicks Save & Continue
AND The Admin searches for the same user's username
AND The Admin clicks on the user's name
AND The Admin clicks Profile
custom_expected: THEN The change the Admin made is reflected on the Profile page

title: Verify a user's profile can be modified from the My Profile page
custom_preconds: GIVEN The User is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The User clicks My Profile in the left menu
AND The User changes one of the inputs in the fields
AND The User clicks Save & Continue
AND The user clicks My Profile in the left menu
custom_expected: THEN The change the User made is reflected on the My Profile page

title: Verify checking the "This user has access to all Networks & Properties" checkbox hides the Add Network button
custom_preconds: GIVEN The Admin is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The Admin clicks "Users" in the left menu
AND The Admin searches for a user who does not have the "This user has access to all Networks & Properties" checkbox checked
AND The Admin clicks on the user's name
AND The Admin checks the "This user has access to all Networks & Properties" checkbox
custom_expected: THEN The Add Network button should be hidden

title: Verify when users receive an "Access Granted" notification email when they are added as an owner of a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The user adds an owner to a form
AND The user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN The owner receives an "Access Granted" email

title: Verify all editors receive a "Form Approved" notification email when the form's status changes to Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN All owners except one has approved a form
custom_steps:
WHEN The last owner opens the Approvals tab
AND The last owner clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected: THEN All editors should receive a "Form Approved" email

title: Verify review requestor receives a "Approved" notification email if the reviewer Approves the form
custom_preconds: GIVEN The editor has requested approval from multiple owners
custom_steps: WHEN The owner approves the form
custom_expected: THEN The user who requested the review will receive an "Approved" email (unless it is the last owner to Approve a form)

title: Verify review requestor receives a "Rejected" notification email if the reviewer Rejects the form
custom_preconds: GIVEN The editor has requested approval from an owner
custom_steps: WHEN The owner rejects the form
custom_expected: THEN The user who requested the review will receive a "Rejected" email

title: Verify owner receives a "Review Requested" notification email if an editor requests approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND All conditions required to request approval are met
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor opens the Approvals tab
AND The editor clicks the "Request Approval" button for any owner
custom_expected: THEN The owner receives a "Review Requested" email

title: Verify "Form Live" notification email gets sent to owners and creator when the form's status changes to Live manually
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form has a set Go Live set to "As soon as possible" on the Settings page
AND The form's status is Approved
custom_steps:
WHEN The user hovers over the Actions menu
AND The user clicks the Go live now link
custom_expected:
THEN The owners and creator receive a "Form Live" email

NOTE:
The user who clicks the Go live now link will not receive a "Form Live" email

title: Verify "Form Live" notification email gets sent to owners and creator when the form's status changes to Live at a set date/time
custom_preconds: GIVEN A form's status is Ready to go live
custom_steps: WHEN The Go Live date/time is reached
custom_expected: THEN The owners and creator receive a "Form Live" email

title: Verify "Form Deactivated" notification email gets sent to owners and creator when the form's status changes to Deactivated manually
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form's status is Live
custom_steps:
WHEN The user hovers over the Actions menu
AND The user clicks Deactivate
custom_expected:
THEN The owners receive a "Form Deactivated" email

NOTE:
The user who clicks Deactivate will not receive a "Form Deactivated" email

title: Verify "Form Deactivated" notification email gets sent to owners and creator when the form's status changes to Deactivated at a set date/time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form's status is Live
custom_steps: WHEN The Deactivation date/time is reached
custom_expected: THEN The owners and creator receive a "Form Deactivated" email

title: Verify "Resume Editing" notification email gets sent to owners when an editor clicks the Resume Editing link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The editor has a form open
AND The form's status is Waiting for Approval, Approved, Rejected, or Ready to Go Live
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor hovers over the Actions menu
AND The editor clicks the Resume Editing link
AND The editor clicks on the "Resume Editing" button in the confirmation pop up
custom_expected: THEN The owners receive a "Resume Editing" email

title: Verify "New Submission" notification email gets sent to users who are set up for Submission Alerts
custom_preconds: GIVEN A form is opened
custom_steps: WHEN A user submits the form
custom_expected: THEN Users who are set up for Submission Alerts for the form receives a "New Submission" email

title: Verify "Form Updated" notification email gets sent to editors of the form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The editor has a form open that has multiple editors
AND The editor saves a new version of the form or sets the form to Ready to go live
custom_steps: WHEN The editor saves a new version of the form, sets the form to Ready to go live, or sets to the form to Archived
custom_expected: THEN Other editors receive a "Form Updated" email

title: Verify "Comments Added" notification email gets sent to owners of the form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The user is on the Activity tab
custom_steps:
WHEN The user inputs a comment in the "Add your comment..." text box
AND The user clicks the Add Comment button
custom_expected: THEN The owners receive a "Comments Added" email

title: Verify "Form Saved" notification email gets sent to owners of the form that was just created
custom_preconds: GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor creates a new form with owners
OR The editor clones a form
custom_expected: THEN The owners receive a "Form Saved" email

title: Verify "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email gets sent to all editors, owners, and watchers one week prior to deactivation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form has editors, owners, and watchers
AND The form's status is Live
custom_steps: WHEN The set deactivation time is in one week
custom_expected: THEN All editors, owners, and watchers on a form should receive a "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email

title: Verify "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email gets sent to all editors, owners, and watchers one day prior to deactivation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form has editors, owners, and watchers
AND The form's status is Live
custom_steps: WHEN The set deactivation time is in one day
custom_expected: THEN All editors, owners, and watchers on a form should receive a "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email

title: Verify "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email gets sent to all editors, owners, and watchers one hour prior to deactivation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND The form has editors, owners, and watchers
AND The form's status is Live
custom_steps: WHEN The set deactivation time is in one hour
custom_expected: THEN All editors, owners, and watchers on a form should receive a "Form To Be Deactivated" notification email
